title: Quick question in-terms of rewards.
body: I'm currently, one loss off demotion  from G5 to S1 (I think :P). And I have not received my gold rewards yet. So if I play a game in solo queue now, and get demoted, would it give me the silver, or gold rewards?

replies.body: Yeah I know about the whole mmr deal. I lose like 22+ and gain like 12-14 so I'm pretty sure my mmr is low enough. RIP how did I get in this situation lol.
I'm in the same situation than you but in Silver 5 :3, I'm just gonna leave ranked until provisionals next season. Don't want my mmr to drop much more before provisionals :P

The season ended at almost 18 hours ago, whatever you had at that time is the rewards that you will get. You can play ranked without having to worry about losing your rewards, but if you go down it will affect your mmr for the provisionals next season.

I read somewhere that you can't go down from gold 5 to silver 1 unless you have the mmr of Silver 5.(This part could be wrong though)
